Posts.Content: Good luck with your research- i was not triple negative but is there a way to reach out to another medical opinion to help you decide? Ie MD Anderson? Mayo? Boston....    Hugs susan
Posts.Title: Newbie! Tiny 1.7 mm triple negative w/amended lymph report needs help choosing right treatment plan

Posts.Content: Glad they are able to schedule tests ASAP - as you deserve! hugs!
